net.cloud.gfx.elements.modal

Class ConfirmationDialogListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.gfx.elements.modal.DialogListener<java.lang.Boolean>
      • net.cloud.gfx.elements.modal.ConfirmationDialogListener

  • public class ConfirmationDialogListener
extends DialogListener<java.lang.Boolean>
    A listener that will wait until the user has chosen an option. The options are confirm and not confirm, so the results are true and false, respectively. Of course, normal restrictions apply, make sure the wait will not deadlock your application.

      • dialog

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfirmationDialogListener

        public ConfirmationDialogListener(ConfirmationDialog dialog)
        Create a listener on the given dialog. This listener will allow you to wait until the dialog has been read and acted on. Creating this will attach a listener to the dialog.
        Parameters:
        dialog - The dialog to listen on
